turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would you have time to pick up some Casey's Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Certainly. I will pull up their app to see what is on special.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No forget the specials.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes sir. What do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am having some old college buddies over and we are craving Taco Pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many? what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 6 Large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay looks like that will be 45 minutes to complete.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: which Casey's did you order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The one on main street in Shelbyville.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh please order from the one on Rangeline in Columbia. That is where we are meeting.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will change that right away.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sorry about that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Not a problem. You want any drinks. Do you still need me to pick them up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No No, I just meant to order them. I will pick them up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: have them put the doritos and lettuce on the side so they don't get soggy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes sir, Oh I will need to call in to make that request.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: please make it happen.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Give me just a few moments. ......All right. all set. 6 large taco pizzas with lettuce and chips on the side. The receipt will show up in your email.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am really looking forward to this. Have a nice evening and thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure. good news. looks like they will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Even better.
